column2: You see a decrepit old man. He grumbles nothing but the words, "Get your money up."
column3: I'm Old Man John, and... you disgust me. You and your foul torch and stupid looking sword. The only thing that has value in this world is... money! And you got none of that, do ya? Broke boy, lil baby guy. Get ya money up sonny!

column2: Blocking the entryway to the north is a big ogre looking fellow.
column3: Hold it. I'm the guard of this passage, and you gotta prove you got what it takes to get past me.
